scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run copy:renderer
scripts.build:windows: npm run clean && npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run copy:renderer:windows
scripts.compile: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js --dir --config.asar=false
scripts.compile:windows: cross-env MODE=production npm run build:windows && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js --dir --config.asar=false
scripts.release:m1: MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js --publish always
scripts.test: npm run test:main && npm run test:preload
scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env MODE=development electron .
